summary: This document is a memo from Michael Salnick, an attorney, to Janusz Banasiak, an Assistant United States Attorney, regarding the provision of requested documents following a meeting. The memo includes references to financial records and household management details related to Jeffrey Epstein and Janusz Banasiak.

persons.name: Michael Salnick
persons.context: Michael Salnick is the sender of the memo, providing documents requested by Janusz Banasiak.

persons.name: Janusz Banasiak
persons.context: Janusz Banasiak is the recipient of the memo, indicating his involvement in the legal proceedings related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned in the context of financial records and household management details.

persons.name: Nusz Banasiak
persons.context: Nusz Banasiak is mentioned in relation to employment and financial records.

connections.description: Michael Salnick is providing requested documents to Janusz Banasiak, indicating a professional relationship.
Nusz Banasiak is mentioned in the context of employment records related to Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
keyFacts: The memo was sent on February 2, 2007, from Michael Salnick to Janusz Banasiak.
The document includes financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein's household.
There are references to employment and tax records for individuals associated with Epstein.
